mapper.select: SELECT ap.attendance_approval_no attendanceApprovalNo , ap.attendance_approval_title attendanceApprovalTitle , e.employee_name employeeName , name.name NAME , status.name status FROM attendance_approval ap LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON e.employee_no = ap.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common name ON name.`code` = ap.attendance_approval_type LEFT OUTER JOIN common status ON status.`code` = ap.attendance_approval_status WHERE ap.use_yn = 1 AND ap.employee_no = #{employeeNo}
